results.definition: provide evidence for; stand as proof of; show by one's behavior, attitude, or external attributes
examples: This decision demonstrates his sense of fairness

results.definition: give an exhibition of to an interested audience
establish the validity of something, as by an example, explanation or experiment
examples: The experiment demonstrated the instability of the compound

results.definition: march in protest; take part in a demonstration
examples: Thousands demonstrated against globalization during the meeting of the most powerful economic nations in Seattle
